Getting Started

  • Set Up Your Services: Navigate to Sales > Products and set up your hair salon services and products.
  • Configure Appointment Types: In the Appointment app, create types that match your services.
  • Design Your Website: Use the Website app to create an attractive online presence for your salon.
  • Set Up Your Point of Sale: Configure your POS system for efficient in-salon transactions.
  • Manage Your Inventory: Input your hair care products and stock levels in the Inventory app.
  • Start Booking Appointments: Begin using the Appointment app to schedule client services.

Tips for Success

Configure loyalty programs or promotions within your Point of Sale.

Encourage clients to book through your online Appointment page to reduce your efforts. 

Set up Reminders on appointments to reduce no-show rate.

Use the POS system to upsell hair care products during checkout.

Monitor your inventory levels closely to ensure you have popular products in stock.
